availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry L. Gilliss (Whitley County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, farmer. Farmer in Whitley County Kentucky in 1860. Mustered into Company F, 16th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment as a 1st Lieutenant on December 21, 1861. Resigned from military service on February 28, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, p. 117.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0291.
